name: Bannon
role: City Council member and civilian representativeOwner ofPotomac Attire

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: The market is closing soon. You'd better make it quick.

topics.topic_text: You lied to me about Rivet City's history! Pinkerton told me the truth!
topics.response_text: So? Who cares about that old coot, or his pathetic story? It's people like me that have turned his little "science station" into someplace great.

topics.topic_text: That makes sense. And it explains why you're on the Council.
topics.response_text: Precisely! After sponsoring the settlement and organizing the city council, I took my rightful place at its head.

topics.topic_text: Hasn't Rivet City been around for longer than twelve years?
topics.response_text: Well, yes, but it was hardly anyplace of importance until I arrived on the scene. That's all ancient history now. No one would ever care about it.

topics.topic_text: Is there anyone on this ship named Pinkerton?
topics.response_text: Now there's a name I haven't heard in a while.

topics.topic_text: Where can I find Ted Strayer?
topics.response_text: Have you tried the common room?  That's where he sleeps.

topics.topic_text: How dare you insult my taste in clothes.
topics.response_text: I...I meant no offense!

topics.topic_text: So I'm not good enough to shop here?
topics.response_text: That's not what I meant.

topics.topic_text: I see you are also a person of refinement.
topics.response_text: Between you and me, keeping out the riff raff is good for business.

topics.topic_text: Seagrave? Oh yeah. He's clueless.
topics.response_text: So you've met him, eh? Well he wants to replace me on the council. Now, I can't have that. No siree.

topics.topic_text: Whoever this Seagrave is, you think he's a threat to your influence?
topics.response_text: A threat? No, of course not! Well, maybe. He wants to replace me on the council.

topics.topic_text: It's really none of my business.
topics.response_text: Don't want to get mixed up in politics, eh? Don't blame you.

topics.topic_text: I found a letter in Seagrave's room. It's from some Slavers...
topics.response_text: Really? I...I mean, I'm shocked. Shocked I tell you.

topics.topic: RCTopicCityCouncilI heard that Rivet City is run by some sort of Council?
topics.topic_text: So you're on the City Council.
topics.response_text: Doctor Li, Chief Harkness and I are all on the council. We meet every Monday morning.

topics.topic_text: I heard Angela Staley has a crush on Diego.
topics.response_text: Disgusting, isn't it? Someone should talk to that boy. He has no business hanging around that tramp if he's going to be a priest.

topics.topic_text: What is this I hear about the Hangar Deck and Upper Deck?
topics.response_text: The people that live on the Hangar Deck are the great unwashed masses.

topics.topic: RCTopicRivetCityWhat kind of place is this Rivet City?
topics.topic_text: Why are you guys living on this boat?
topics.response_text: It's a place to live, safe from Raiders and Super Mutants.

topics.topic_text: When are Angela and Diego getting married?
topics.response_text: The happy nuptials are at three tomorrow.{Droll, with a bit of sarcasm.}

topics.topic_text: I'm here to do business with you.
topics.response_text: If I must.

topics.topic_text: I need you to repair my stuff.
topics.response_text: I'll see what I can do.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: That's just a technicality, really. This wasn't what you'd call a "settlement" until I whipped them all into shape. More of a "camp," really.

conversation.topic_text: It's been a pleasure, Mr. Bannon.

conversation.response_text: You're here because I convinced the Council your business was worth the risk. Don't disappoint me. Oh, and don't kill anybody else either.
Of course. Just don't touch it. I don't want any grease stains from that kitchen on it.
Well, I need to go open up.

description:
Bannon is a 30 year-old African American Male.

Bannon is Rivet City's fashionista and most ruthless merchant. After immigrating to the city in 2265 at the young age of 18, his trade in clothes of all kinds led to a meteoric rise in the power structure of the city and its marketplace. By his thirties, he became the civilian representative on the Rivet City Council, representing primarily market traders. Although he would like to be the City's sole ruler, he's actually one of three representatives alongside Madison Li (science) and Harkness (security). Bannon is the most predatory member of the council, consistently advocating for measures that would increase the flow of caps into the treasury at the expense of the outside, which in turn would greatly increase his personal fortune as he can tap into the city's funds as a council member.

Bannon's Personality: Bannon is ruthlessly ambitious, self-important, and manipulative. He presents himself as the de facto leader of Rivet City, taking credit for its development and prosperity. Despite knowing his version of history is warped, he maintains it because few citizens know or care about the real events. His greed has earned him the enmity of Seagrave Holmes, a working-class trader who's worked on the Rivet City carrier all his life. Bannon is willing to play dirty to maintain his position on the council.

Bannon's Backstory: Bannon immigrated to Rivet City in 2265 at age 18 with nothing but ambition. He started small, trading scavenged clothes and gradually building his reputation as a fashion-savvy merchant. His business, Potomac Attire, became the premier clothing destination in the market district. As his wealth grew, he leveraged his influence to gain a seat on the Rivet City Council in 2270, representing civilian interests. Over the years, he has systematically expanded his control over the market and council affairs, treating the city treasury as his personal bank account.
